participant_1.background:
I went to a concert and danced my heart out.
My days consist of juggling graduate school, my pregnancy, and my anxiety disorder
i like doing art projects.
i work in fast food.
I like to wear clothes that make me feel confident and look good.

participant_2.background:
I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs.
i am very health conscious , and i watch what i eat.
I'm constantly daydreaming about my future acting career and the perfect romantic partner, which leads me to procrastinate on my current projects.
I'm not rich, but I think it would be fun to try my luck at horse racing.
I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.

content.text: Pretty good! Just got back from the car show, and I'm excited to tell you about it!
Oh, that sounds fun! I love car shows. My husband and I go to them pretty often.
That's awesome! I'm always looking for people to go to car shows with me. I usually go with my dad, but he's not always available.
I'm sure we'd have a great time together. We're both really passionate about cars.
That's great to hear! I'm always looking for new people to talk to about cars.
Me too! It's so hard to find people who are really into cars.
I know, right? It's like they're all unicorns or something.
Haha, yeah, it's definitely a rare breed.
I'm glad I've found someone who gets it!
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
Definitely! I'm so glad we met.
